description: Fully PFC-free, featured for versatility and focused on mobility, the Powder Town Pants have an H2No® Performance Standard 2-layer shell for waterproof/breathable and windproof protection, an articulated fit for freedom of movement and a smooth mesh liner for comfort and easy layering. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Powder Town Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: 2-layer, 3.5-oz 75-denier 100% postconsumer recycled polyester plain weave with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
(front panels) 3.8-oz 100% recycled polyester tricot mesh; (upper-back panels) 5.3-oz 100% recycled polyester brushed tricot with a HeiQ® Eco Dry PFC-free DWR finish
two handwarmers and two midthigh pockets
